name: @ondewo/ondewo-sip-client-js
description: Ondewo sip creation and handling client library for js

scripts.build: docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/../api:/output-volume ondewo-js-proto-compiler ondewo-sip-api ondewo-sip-api ondewo
scripts.build-update: npm run build-only && npm run start-example
scripts.start-example: sudo cp lib/sip.js example/lib/sip.js && http-server example
scripts.build-sample: docker run -it -v ${PWD}/src:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/src/../api:/output-volume $npm_package_config_compiler sip ondewo-sip-api ondewo-sip-api ondewo

author: ONDEWO GmbH
